response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. Given its immense value and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price not only ensures you receive exceptional value but also allows us to fairly compensate for the product's quality and the effort put into creating it. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
